name: Fever Dreams (Reimagined)
description:
What if you had the worst nightmare of your life, and then you woke up into another one that's somehow much... much worse?

The goal of this game is simple.

Wake up.

But is it really that simple? Or will your nightmares be too strong and keep you in an eternal slumber of suffering until you rot away in the real world?

Wake up. This is just a dream..
Or is it?
